ASCENT.Definition: the act of climbing or moving upwards

ASPIRING.Definition: hoping and trying to be successful at a particular activity

CAMPAIGNS.Definition: a planned group of especially political, business, or military activities that are intended to achieve a particular aim

CAPITALISED.Definition: to use a situation to your own advantage

CHLORINE.Definition: a chemical element that is a greenish-yellow gas with a strong smell, added to water in order to kill organisms that might cause infection

CHOLERA.Definition: a serious infection of the bowels caused by drinking infected water or eating infected food, causing diarrhoea, vomiting, and often death

COINCIDED.Definition: to happen at or near the same time

CONDITIONED.Definition: made to think or believe something

ENCOUNTER.Definition: a meeting, especially one that happens by chance

FORMULA.Definition: a standard or accepted way of doing or making something

GLACIER.Definition: a large mass of ice that moves slowly

LOGO.Definition: a design or symbol used by a company to advertise its products

MUNICIPAL.Definition: of or belonging to a town or city

ON THE CONTINENT.Definition: used in the United Kingdom to refer to the main land of Europe

PHENOMENON.Definition: something that exists and can be seen, felt, tasted, etc., especially something unusual or interesting

PLUMMETED.Definition: to fall very quickly and suddenly

PREYED ON.Definition: to hurt or deceive a group of people, especially people who are weak or can easily be hurt or deceived

PRICE TAG.Definition: a piece of paper with a price that is attached to a product, or the amount that something costs

QUENCHING.Definition: (of a liquid) stops you from being thirsty

SETTLEMENTS.Definition: a place where people come to live or the process of settling in such a place

SKYROCKETED.Definition: to rise extremely quickly or make extremely quick progress towards success

SPA.Definition: a town where water comes out of the ground and people come to drink it or lie in it because they think it will improve their health

SPARKLE.Definition: to shine brightly with a lot of small points of light

SPAS.Definition: towns where water comes out of the ground and people come to drink it or lie in it because they think it will improve their health

STATUS SYMBOL.Definition: a thing that people want to have because they think other people will admire them if they have it:

TAGLINES.Definition: a short, easily remembered phrase that a company uses in its advertisements, especially on television or the internet, so that people will recognize it or its products

UNFIT.Definition: not suitable or good enough for a particular purpose or activity

UPROAR.Definition: a situation in which a lot of people complain about something angrily or make a lot of noise

WELLS.Definition: a deep hole in the ground from which you can get water, oil, or gas
